verses.text: \w My|strong="H8104"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* words \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w treasure|strong="H6845"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* within \w you|strong="H8104"\w*.

\w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w live|strong="H2421"\w*; \w guard|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w teachings|strong="H8451"\w* \w as|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* apple \f + \fr 7:2 \ft Literally the pupil\f* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w your|strong="H8104"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w Tie|strong="H7194"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* fingers; \w write|strong="H3789"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tablet|strong="H3871"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

Say \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, “\w You|strong="H7121"\w* are \w my|strong="H7121"\w* sister,” \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* understanding \w your|strong="H7121"\w* \w kinsman|strong="H4129"\w*,

that they may \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w you|strong="H8104"\w* \w from|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w adulteress|strong="H2114"\w*, \w from|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w stranger|strong="H2114"\w* with seductive words.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w window|strong="H2474"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w looked|strong="H8259"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lattice.

\w crossing|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w street|strong="H7784"\w* near \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*, strolling \w down|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

\w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w twilight|strong="H5399"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* fading \w into|strong="H3915"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w dark|strong="H5399"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* woman came out \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H7125"\w*, \w with|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H2181"\w* \w attire|strong="H7897"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w and|strong="H3820"\w* \w cunning|strong="H5341"\w* \w of|strong="H3820"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w She|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w loud|strong="H1993"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* defiant; \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remain|strong="H7931"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6471"\w* \w in|strong="H6471"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w street|strong="H2351"\w*, \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w in|strong="H6471"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w squares|strong="H7339"\w*, she lurks \w at|strong="H7339"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w corner|strong="H6438"\w*.

\w She|strong="H6440"\w* \w seizes|strong="H2388"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w kisses|strong="H5401"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*; \w she|strong="H6440"\w* brazenly says \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*:

“\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w made|strong="H7999"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w peace|strong="H8002"\w* \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*; \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* \w paid|strong="H7999"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w vows|strong="H5088"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*; \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w sought|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4714"\w* \w have|strong="H4714"\w* \w decked|strong="H7234"\w* \w my|strong="H7234"\w* \w bed|strong="H6210"\w* \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w coverings|strong="H4765"\w*, \w with|strong="H4714"\w* \w colored|strong="H2405"\w* linen \w from|strong="H4714"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w I|strong="H4904"\w* have \w perfumed|strong="H5130"\w* \w my|strong="H5130"\w* \w bed|strong="H4904"\w* \w with|strong="H4904"\w* \w myrrh|strong="H4753"\w*, \w with|strong="H4904"\w* aloes, \w and|strong="H4753"\w* \w with|strong="H4904"\w* \w cinnamon|strong="H7076"\w*.

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, \w let|strong="H3212"\w* us \w take|strong="H3212"\w* \w our|strong="H7301"\w* \w fill|strong="H7301"\w* \w of|strong="H1730"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*. \w Let|strong="H3212"\w* us \w delight|strong="H5965"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* loving caresses!

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* husband \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w*; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w gone|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w long|strong="H7350"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3117"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bag|strong="H6872"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w will|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H3947"\w* return till \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w moon|strong="H3677"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w full|strong="H3117"\w*.”

\w With|strong="H2506"\w* \w her|strong="H5186"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* persuasion \w she|strong="H8193"\w* \w entices|strong="H5186"\w* \w him|strong="H5186"\w*; \w with|strong="H2506"\w* \w her|strong="H5186"\w* \w flattering|strong="H2506"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w she|strong="H8193"\w* lures \w him|strong="H5186"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1980"\w* \w follows|strong="H1980"\w* \w her|strong="H1980"\w* \w on|strong="H1980"\w* impulse, \w like|strong="H1980"\w* an \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \w going|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H2874"\w*, \w like|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* deer bounding \w into|strong="H1980"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap,\f + \fr 7:22 \ft Probable reading (see LXX, Vulgate, Syriac); Hebrew like fetters to discipline a fool\f*

\w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H3588"\w* \w arrow|strong="H2671"\w* \w pierces|strong="H6398"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w*, \w like|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* darting \w into|strong="H5704"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w snare|strong="H6341"\w*— \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H5315"\w* cost \w him|strong="H1931"\w* \w his|strong="H3045"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H8085"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w attend|strong="H7181"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w words|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* let \w your|strong="H1870"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w turn|strong="H7847"\w* \w aside|strong="H7847"\w* \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*; \w do|strong="H1870"\w* \w not|strong="H1870"\w* \w stray|strong="H8582"\w* \w into|strong="H7847"\w* \w her|strong="H1870"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* brought \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H7227"\w* death; \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* \w are|strong="H7227"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w in|strong="H7227"\w* \w number|strong="H6099"\w*.

\w Her|strong="H3381"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Sheol|strong="H7585"\w*, \w descending|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w chambers|strong="H2315"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.
